item.description:
Let's plan to do a bike to Walden and Swim! We had a good turn out for the first meet up and I am excited to go from here. A group will meet up in the brookline/boston area to bike out to walden. I will map out the distances and as with the run try to form 2-3 groups for those who want a longer swim and for those who are having their first open water swim.

Unfortunately because of time constraints I won't be able to drive anyone (I will be biking from Walden to work in Waltham). If you are in need of a ride, just post that in your RSVP message and I'll try to figure something out for you!

For those of you brand new to the tri community this will be a great chance to experience some open water swimming in a friendly environment. (I sure wish I had at least practiced open water swimming before my first tri!)

I will update with more details soon. Please contact me if you have questions or check the site for updates.

Also as always, if you have suggestions for a meet up whether it be an actual training event or otherwise, let me know!
item.name: Bike to Walden / Swim
